data.title: Matt and Ben – TheVLT
data.text:
Runs Aug 3, 2024

Written by: Mindy Kaling and Brenda Withers

Directed by: Aaron Michael Smart

Featuring: Emma Weinkauf and Lauren Murray

“ONE NIGHT ONLY!! Weinkauf and Murray, in association with Theatre Box, presents MATT & BEN, a play by Mindy Kaling and Brenda Withers!

Matt & Ben depicts its Hollywood golden boys – before J-Lo, before Gwyneth, before Project Greenlight, before Oscar…before anyone actually gave a damn. When the screen play for Good Will Hunting drops mysteriously from the heavens, the boys realize they’re being tested by a Higher Power.

7:30pm performance time

This Special Event is not eligible for Flex Pass usage.
